General.Name: Denge Yatirim Holding AS
General.Description: Denge Yatirim Holding A.S. engages in the logistics, real estate, technology, industry, and financial businesses in Turkey and internationally. The company offers long, medium, and short-term export prefinancing, import financing, receivables and stock financing, trade and project financing; and business, investment, and project finance loans, as well as engages in international payment and collection business. It also provides port integrated logistics services; bulk cargo, agricultural, urban, and project logistics services; FTL and LTL transportation services; and fleet services with a fleet of 28 owned and 36 rental vehicles. In addition, the company engages in the residential building construction; production of motion pictures, serials, documentary films, commercials, television programs and other content for national and international cinema, television, and digital broadcasting platforms; and sales, distribution, and after-sales services of computer and peripheral products. Further, it offers subscriber facility and maintenance services, network infrastructure project and application services, and access network and security solutions. Additionally, the company engages in construction contracting activities, such as engineering and architecture, project development, housing, and business center production. Denge Yatirim Holding A.S. was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
